snippet.title: Memoreum Gameplay Reveal Trailer | VR Games Showcase Spring 2025
snippet.description:
Get a fresh look at anticipated sci-fi survival horror game, Memoreum, coming from Patient 8 Games and 2080 Games!

Wishlist on Quest and learn more: https://linktr.ee/Memoreum

MEMOREUM is a VR sci-fi action horror campaign from Patient 8 Games, the team
behind hit Half Life: Alyx Mod, Return to Rapture. The Ichor Infection has taken over the
last ship of humanity. You are Dr. Otto Hudson, fighting to unravel the mystery behind
the outbreak as your fragmented mind slips from reality.

__________________________________
